run_differential_expression_analysis()¶

Run marginal, per-gene differential expression analyses.

run_differential_expression_analysis() runs the differential analysis script gene-signature-pipeline-ml-pipeline/R/differential_expression_analysis.R.

An independent case/control differential expression analysis is run for each dataset defined in data/datasets.json, and for each group comparison defined in data/comparisons.json.

pd.DataFrame

A dataframe with the schema

run_edge_weight_distribution_analysis(data_dir, group, qval_thresh)¶
